name: <<set:MS>><<set:M>><<set:S>>Death's Harp
flavourText: The mournful music of the strings,
The creaking arch, the arrow sings.
A choking cry, a rattled breath,
The Reaper's Song, the Harp of Death.

name: <<set:MS>><<set:M>><<set:S>>The Consuming Dark
flavourText: The brightest flames cast the darkest shadows.
explicitMods: +1 to Level of Socketed Fire Gems
45% of Fire Damage Converted to Chaos Damage

name: <<set:MS>><<set:M>><<set:S>>Goldwyrm
flavourText: The wyrm draws warmth from the fires of desire.

name: <<set:MS>><<set:M>><<set:S>>Vivid Vessel
descrText: Place into an allocated Jewel Socket on the Passive Skill Tree. Right click to remove from the Socket.

This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Active Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

flavourText: "Masters of wit, strength and cunning. To survive the harsh winters, you must be like the fox."
- Ezomyte Proverb

name: <<set:MS>><<set:M>><<set:S>>Nomic's Storm
flavourText: It takes a clear mind to outrun a storm.
explicitMods: 20% increased Movement Speed while on Full Energy Shield

name: <<set:MS>><<set:M>><<set:S>>Null's Inclination
flavourText: The hunt continues when the prey falls.
explicitMods: Minions deal 1% increased Damage per 10 Dexterity
Cast Socketed Minion Spells on Kill with this Weapon

name: <<set:MS>><<set:M>><<set:S>>Night's Hold
flavourText: In the light of Solaris, the shadows cower and hide.
But every night they gather and grow,
and all but the strong and the stupid
seek shelter from their grasp until daybreak.
explicitMods: Socketed Gems are Supported by level 10 Added Chaos Damage
Socketed Gems are supported by level 10 Blind
Socketed Gems are supported by level 10 Cast when Stunned

name: <<set:MS>><<set:M>><<set:S>>Daresso's Defiance
flavourText: "When your back is against the wall,
And your opponent is bleeding you dry,
There is only one appropriate response:
Unbridled, overwhelming violence."
- Daresso, the Sword King
explicitMods: 0.51% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Life
You lose all Endurance Charges when Hit
You gain an Endurance Charge on Kill
You gain Onslaught for 1 second per Endurance Charge when Hit

name: <<set:MS>><<set:M>><<set:S>>Soulthirst
flavourText: "They say a draught of fine spirits will ward off
the elements and promote a longer, merrier life.
I have found this to be true on all counts."
- Zerphi of the Vaal
explicitMods: Gain Soul Eater while using a Flask
Lose Souls gained from Soul Eater on Flask Use

name: <<set:MS>><<set:M>><<set:S>>Soul Pendant
flavourText: The First Ones hold us
between two sharpened blades.
That should we stray too far from the path,
we find ourselves severed.
- The Wolven King

name: <<set:MS>><<set:M>><<set:S>>Night's Hold
flavourText: In the light of Solaris, the shadows cower and hide.
But every night they gather and grow,
and all but the strong and the stupid
seek shelter from their grasp until daybreak.

name: <<set:MS>><<set:M>><<set:S>>Lioneye's Paws
flavourText: Stand and lead the righteous pride,
Fight till death, never hide.
explicitMods: Adds 12 to 24 Fire Damage to Attacks
40% reduced Movement Speed when on Low Life
Cannot be Stunned when on Low Life

name: <<set:MS>><<set:M>><<set:S>>Night's Hold
flavourText: In the light of Solaris, the shadows cower and hide.
But every night they gather and grow,
and all but the strong and the stupid
seek shelter from their grasp until daybreak.
explicitMods: Socketed Gems are Supported by level 10 Added Chaos Damage
Socketed Gems are supported by level 10 Blind
Socketed Gems are supported by level 10 Cast when Stunned

name: <<set:MS>><<set:M>><<set:S>>Corpse Pendant
flavourText: Look not upon me with fear, my men.
Though I seem strange, even monstrous,
were you to see with the eyes of your forebears,
your hearts would be filled with wonder.
- The Wolven King
implicitMods: 10% chance to gain a Power Charge on Kill

name: <<set:MS>><<set:M>><<set:S>>Queen's Decree
flavourText: The nobles wanted to take her throne.
She let the peasants take their wealth.
The peasants wanted to take her wealth.
She let the soldiers take their heads.
The soldiers wanted to take her head.
She sat on her throne and wept.

name: <<set:MS>><<set:M>><<set:S>>Pillar of the Caged God
flavourText: Forged to rule the waves and tide
Destined to serve the monkey's paw
Strong as a tower of iron
Deft as the needle doubt
explicitMods: 1% increased Area of Effect Radius per 20 Intelligence
16% increased Physical Weapon Damage per 10 Strength

name: <<set:MS>><<set:M>><<set:S>>Hrimnor's Hymn
flavourText: "The crack of bone, the spray of blood.
Is there sweeter music?"
- Hrimnor of the Ezomytes.
explicitMods: 1% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Life

name: <<set:MS>><<set:M>><<set:S>>Tremor Rod
flavourText: The best way to gain the element of surprise,
is to let your enemy learn your plans,
and execute them - twice.
explicitMods: Socketed Gems are Supported by level 10 Remote Mine
Mines can be Detonated an additional time

name: <<set:MS>><<set:M>><<set:S>>Voidhome
flavourText: Cursed is the star whence it came.
explicitMods: 0.4% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Mana

name: <<set:MS>><<set:M>><<set:S>>Voidhome
flavourText: Cursed is the star whence it came.
explicitMods: 0.4% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Mana

name: <<set:MS>><<set:M>><<set:S>>Limbsplit
flavourText: Swinging through the air, it sings
of sundered, severed, missing things.
explicitMods: +1 to Level of Socketed Strength Gems

flavourText: Cursed is the star whence it came.

name: <<set:MS>><<set:M>><<set:S>>Relentless Fury
flavourText: Relentless fury
Sunder my every foe
Fuel my boiling blood

name: <<set:MS>><<set:M>><<set:S>>The Screaming Eagle
flavourText: The eagle knows nothing
but the scream and the strike.
explicitMods: Socketed Gems are supported by Level 2 Chance to Flee

name: <<set:MS>><<set:M>><<set:S>>Silverbranch
flavourText: "The wild takes care of its own."
- Hyrri of the Karui
explicitMods: +1 to Level of Socketed Bow Gems

name: <<set:MS>><<set:M>><<set:S>>Brightbeak
flavourText: "I know how to say 'faster' and 'attack'
in Karui, Marak and Ezo."
- Voll of Thebrus

name: <<set:MS>><<set:M>><<set:S>>Dreadarc
flavourText: The fastest way to a man's heart
is through his sternum.
explicitMods: Curse Enemies with Flammability on Hit

explicitMods: Adds 13 to 30 Fire Damage to Spells

name: <<set:MS>><<set:M>><<set:S>>Quill Rain
flavourText: "The rain of a thousand quills that whittle
present into past, life into death."
- Rigwald of the Ezomytes

name: <<set:MS>><<set:M>><<set:S>>Phoenix Crack
explicitMods: 53% increased Critical Strike Chance for Spells

name: <<set:MS>><<set:M>><<set:S>>Dreadarc
flavourText: The fastest way to a man's heart

name: <<set:MS>><<set:M>><<set:S>>Lori's Lantern
flavourText: By its light, Lori led her young charges to safety
and bound up their wounds.
Her sword arm was iron, yet her heart gentle
and proof against hate.

name: <<set:MS>><<set:M>><<set:S>>Sentari's Answer
flavourText: Open your eyes and you will see the cracks in your enemy's walls.
Open your mind and you will see the cracks in your enemy's plans.
explicitMods: 25% of Block Chance applied to Spells
Applies level 15 Punishment on Blocking a Melee Attack
Applies level 15 Temporal Chains on Blocking a Projectile Attack
Applies level 15 Elemental Weakness on Blocking a Spell

flavourText: The wolf greeted the king,
In the light of the harvest moon.
The wolf offered the strength of the wild,
And the king paid for it in blood.

name: <<set:MS>><<set:M>><<set:S>>Viper Ornament
explicitMods: +12% to Critical Strike Multiplier while Dual Wielding
descrText: Place into an allocated Jewel Socket on the Passive Skill Tree. Right click to remove from the Socket.

name: <<set:MS>><<set:M>><<set:S>>Wanderlust
flavourText: All the world is my home.

name: <<set:MS>><<set:M>><<set:S>>The Whispering Ice
flavourText: Guard your darkest thoughts well, for they are
the cracks through which the Nightmare crawls.
explicitMods: +1 to Level of Socketed Support Gems

name: <<set:MS>><<set:M>><<set:S>>Briskwrap
flavourText: "I carry neither food nor drink. I rely on the charity
of my fellow wayfarers. Dead men are generous men."
- Taruk of the Wildmen

name: <<set:MS>><<set:M>><<set:S>>Chalice of Horrors
flavourText: An eye for an eye. A curse for a curse.
explicitMods: +1 to Level of Socketed Curse Gems
10% Chance to Cause Monster to Flee on Block

name: <<set:MS>><<set:M>><<set:S>>Bitterdream
flavourText: Fight not the cold
Forsake hope
Be still.
explicitMods: Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 1 Hypothermia
Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 1 Ice Bite
Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 1 Cold Penetration
Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 1 Mana Leech
Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 10 Added Cold Damage
Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 1 Reduced Mana

name: <<set:MS>><<set:M>><<set:S>>Cybil's Paw
flavourText: Tread lightly, lest their vigil find you.
Speak softly, lest their reason fend you.
Cut gently, lest their spirit haunt you.
explicitMods: +5 Life gained for each Enemy hit by your Spells
8% increased Spell Damage per 5% Block Chance
implicitMods: +21 Life gained for each Enemy hit by Attacks

name: <<set:MS>><<set:M>><<set:S>>Fertile Mind
flavourText: "The swallow flew fast and took many turns,
spilling a seed where no plant had grown before.
This seed grew and grew until the desert became fertile and abundant.
Your mind is like this seed."
- Maraketh Proverb
explicitMods: Dexterity from Passives in Radius is Transformed to Intelligence
descrText: Place into an allocated Jewel Socket on the Passive Skill Tree. Right click to remove from the Socket.

name: <<set:MS>><<set:M>><<set:S>>Vortex Knell
explicitMods: +2 to Level of Socketed Cold Gems
74% increased Critical Strike Chance for Spells

name: <<set:MS>><<set:M>><<set:S>>Oro's Sacrifice
flavourText: Give yourself to the flames and your name
will burn in the minds of men forever.
explicitMods: Gain a Frenzy Charge if an Attack Ignites an Enemy

name: <<set:MS>><<set:M>><<set:S>>Morbid Stinger
explicitMods: Adds 5 to 8 Fire Damage to Attacks

name: <<set:MS>><<set:M>><<set:S>>The Anvil
flavourText: Forge your Perseverance on the Anvil of Faith.
explicitMods: Reflects 240 to 300 Physical Damage to Attackers on Block

name: <<set:MS>><<set:M>><<set:S>>Nycta's Lantern
flavourText: Left in her tomb by the lynch mob,
the flame inside still blazed bright after her death,
and so did hers.
explicitMods: Socketed Gems are Supported by level 10 Added Fire Damage
Socketed Gems are Supported by level 10 Cold to Fire
Socketed Gems are Supported by level 10 Fire Penetration
+9 Life gained for each Enemy hit by Attacks

name: <<set:MS>><<set:M>><<set:S>>Matua Tupuna
flavourText: You carried me through life,
The least I can do is carry you through death.
explicitMods: +2 to Level of Socketed Minion Gems
10% increased Effect of Auras on You
10% increased Effect of Auras on your Minions
Spreads Tar when you take a Critical Strike

name: <<set:MS>><<set:M>><<set:S>>Cameria's Maul
flavourText: "You'll have my riches when you pry them
from my cold, dead hands!"
"That's how I prefer it."
explicitMods: 40% increased Rarity of Items Dropped by Frozen Enemies

name: <<set:MS>><<set:M>><<set:S>>Fencoil
flavourText: You've no reason for fear when you're a root in a fen
- Old Ezomyte saying.
explicitMods: Socketed Gems are Supported by level 8 Trap

name: <<set:MS>><<set:M>><<set:S>>Craghead
flavourText: Hit them hard. Hit them once.
explicitMods: Adds 6 to 10 Physical Damage to Attacks with Bows
implicitMods: Adds 1 to 4 Physical Damage to Attacks with Bows

name: <<set:MS>><<set:M>><<set:S>>Tear of Purity
flavourText: A shimmering symbol of Purity, clear as water,
but I know better than most how quickly
Purity can succumb to Corruption.
How quickly water turns to blood.
- Victario, the People's Poet
explicitMods: Grants level 10 Purity of Elements Skill
5% chance to Avoid Elemental Status Ailments
Enchants a rare item with a new random property
descrText: Right click this item then left click a rare item to apply it. Rare items can have up to six random properties.

name: <<set:MS>><<set:M>><<set:S>>Corpse Pendant
flavourText: The Empire poisons our blood with sweet wine.
Poisons our flesh with silk.
Poisons our minds with civil lies.
Poisons our children with servitude.
- The Wolven King

name: <<set:MS>><<set:M>><<set:S>>Woe Noose
flavourText: The Empire poisons our blood with sweet wine.
Poisons our flesh with silk.
Poisons our minds with civil lies.
Poisons our children with servitude.
- The Wolven King

descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.
secDescrText: Sets a marker at a location. While the marker remains, lightning strikes random enemies near it, dealing damage to them. After a short duration, a large bolt of lightning strikes the marker, dealing damage around it. When this happens, it will also set off the lightning at any other markers from this skill.

name: <<set:MS>><<set:M>><<set:S>>Bino's Kitchen Knife
flavourText: Calling it poison would imply
that it was even edible.
explicitMods: On Killing a Poisoned Enemy, nearby Enemies are Poisoned
and nearby Allies Regenerate 200 Life per second

name: <<set:MS>><<set:M>><<set:S>>Lightning Coil
flavourText: "There's nothing like imminent death
to galvanize one's purpose in life."
- Malachai the Soulless.
explicitMods: Adds 1 to 22 Lightning Damage to Attacks
30% of Physical Damage taken as Lightning Damage

name: <<set:MS>><<set:M>><<set:S>>Lori's Lantern

and bound up their wounds.
Her sword arm was iron, yet her heart gentle
and proof against hate.
explicitMods: 7% increased Movement Speed when on Low Life
+25% Chaos Resistance when on Low Life

name: <<set:MS>><<set:M>><<set:S>>Le Heup of All
flavourText: Existence is infinite
A weave of the living and dead
Beyond the understanding
Of the many mortal threads
implicitMods: Adds 1 to 4 Physical Damage to Attacks

name: <<set:MS>><<set:M>><<set:S>>Wideswing
flavourText: Bargg Wurmkin once severed the heads
of seven men in a single cleave.
explicitMods: Socketed Gems are Supported by level 20 Increased Area of Effect

name: <<set:MS>><<set:M>><<set:S>>Ungil's Harmony
flavourText: Gentle anger, raging calm.

name: <<set:MS>><<set:M>><<set:S>>Storm Prison
flavourText: You can never truly tame the tempest.
You can barely even leash it.
explicitMods: 28% chance to gain a Power Charge on Kill

name: <<set:MS>><<set:M>><<set:S>>Goldwyrm
flavourText: The wyrm draws warmth from the fires of desire.

name: <<set:MS>><<set:M>><<set:S>>Dying Breath
flavourText: The whispers of the dead
Carry wisdom for the living,
If you are willing to give your life
To listen.
explicitMods: Nearby Enemies have 18% increased Effect of Curses on them
18% increased effect of Non-Curse Auras you Cast

-Rumi of the Vaal
